QuestData.Title: Patriarch's Blessing
QuestData.Description: You've done it, $n. Even in these times we must honor our dead.$B$BTake these offerings and place them at Aderic's tomb.$B$BLet's hope that's enough to placate the ghosts of our ancestors.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place the Blessed Offerings at Aderic's Tomb.
QuestData.RewardText: It's done, $n. The dead return to their slumber.
